This page contains the list of links pointing to the different chapters in the course notes. 

## Chapters

```{r chpt-table, echo=FALSE}
s_cn_url <- 'https://charlotte-ngs.github.io/lbgfs2020/cn/'
tbl_chpt <- tibble::tibble(Nr      = c(0, 1),
                           Title   = c(
                             "Preface",
                             "Introduction to Livestock Breeding and Genomics"),
                           Link    = c(
                             paste0("[html](", s_cn_url, "00_preface.html), [pdf](", s_cn_url, "00_preface.pdf)", collapse = ""),
                             ""))
knitr::kable(tbl_chpt)
```


## Appendix

```{r app-table, echo=FALSE}
tbl_app <- tibble::tibble(Nr    = c(1, 2),
                          Title = c(
                            "Linear Algebra",
                            "R Programming"
                          ),
                          Link  = c(
                            paste0("[html](", s_cn_url, "A1_intro-linalg.html), [pdf](", s_cn_url, "A1_intro_linalg.pdf)", collapse = ""),
                            ""
                          ))
knitr::kable(tbl_app)
```
